Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_1
Text.Desc: An entry-level secret body that is popular among physical cultivators, easy to achieve with well-balanced components and considerable development potential.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body performance.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body attack accuracy.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a small amount.
Text.Levels.3.Title: Fourth Layer
Text.Levels.3.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body's artifact suppression chance.
Text.Levels.4.Title: Fifth Layer
Text.Levels.4.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a moderate amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_1_1
Text.Desc: An entry-level secret body that is popular among physical cultivators, easy to achieve with well-balanced components and considerable development potential.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body performance.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body attack accuracy.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a small amount.
Text.Levels.3.Title: Fourth Layer
Text.Levels.3.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body's artifact suppression chance.
Text.Levels.4.Title: Fifth Layer
Text.Levels.4.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a moderate amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_2
Text.Desc: Uses both arms as the core and waist as the axis, merging the three Yin elements Metal, Water and Moon in the left arm and the three Yang elements Wood, Fire and Sun in the right arm, and combines them into one. Excels at suppressing the enemy's artifact.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body's artifact suppression chance.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_3
Text.Desc: Uses the energy of the Five Elements within the organs to drive both fists and attacks with five different forms. Excels at attacking the Qi barrier's weak point.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_4
Text.Desc: The most advanced secret skill in Primordial Unity Body. Refines the back muscle to the extreme so that it resembles an eagle's wings. Refines the shoulders to the extreme so that it resembles a bear's torso. Wields power from the waist and sternum, works the spine like a dragon and fends off all attackers with both shoulders.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a large amount.\n Drastically increases the secret body attack accuracy.\n Drastically increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_5
Text.Desc: Uses extreme Yang energy to remold the heart to drastically increase the physical cultivator's power.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Moderately increases the physical cultivator's remold rate.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Drastically increases the ability improvement rate during the physical cultivator's furious berserk.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_6
Text.Desc: Uses extreme Yin energy to remold the heart to drastically increase the physical cultivator's blessing.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Moderately increases the physical cultivator's dodge rate.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Drastically reduces the physical cultivator's True Qi consumption rate of artifact suppression.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_7
Text.Desc: Imitates the dragon and uses the head, spine and pelvis as the core to connect all the bones so that the whole body is controlled by spine movement. Effectively increases the body's attack ability.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Increases the physical cultivator's secret body power by 5%.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Increases the physical cultivator's secret body power by 5%.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Increases the physical cultivator's secret body power by 5%.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_8
Text.Desc: A secret body training method created following the dragon copulation theory for essence shaping used by cultivators with a Golden Core. Draws energy from heart and kidneys with techniques and converges them in the stomach, which is used as a furnace to drastically increase the food consumption and stamina generation. Practice it to the extreme to learn Whale Breathing that can quickly generate essence from nothing.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Moderately increases the physical cultivator's food consumption bonus.\n Moderately increases the physical cultivator's stamina replenishment bonus.\n Slightly increases the physical cultivator's appetite.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the essence acquisition rate from devouring items.\n Moderately increases the amount of essence gained from devouring items.\n Moderately increases the physical cultivator's appetite.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Drastically increases the physical cultivator's food consumption bonus.\n Drastically increases the physical cultivator's stamina replenishment bonus.\n Drastically increases the physical cultivator's appetite.
Text.Levels.3.Title: Fourth Layer
Text.Levels.3.Desc: Drastically increases the essence acquisition rate from devouring items.\n Drastically increases the amount of essence gained from devouring items.\n Increases the physical cultivator's appetite by a huge amount.
Text.Levels.4.Title: Fifth Layer

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_9
Text.Desc: An entry-level secret body for physical cultivators, easy to achieve by remolding both legs with Wood energy and spreading roots into the ground as Wood is counteractive with Earth. Using this secret body resembles a deep-rooted old tree that is unmovable.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body performance.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body defense success rate.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a small amount.
Text.Levels.3.Title: Fourth Layer
Text.Levels.3.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body's artifact suppression chance.
Text.Levels.4.Title: Fifth Layer
Text.Levels.4.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a moderate amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_10
Text.Desc: Imitates a dark tortoise's shell and uses ribs as the core to merge the muscles on waist, back, chest and stomach into a whole that resembles the tortoise shell. Counters all kinds of attack.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a moderate amount.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body defense success rate.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a large amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_1_11
Text.Desc: Uses a secret technique to remold both hands into hollow bones and infuses them with True Qi that grants extreme agility to even catch thunder and lightning in void.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body attack accuracy.\n Slightly increases the secret body defense success rate.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body attack accuracy.\n Slightly increases the secret body defense success rate.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body attack accuracy.\n Slightly increases the secret body defense success rate.

Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer

Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body attack accuracy.\n Slightly increases the secret body defense success rate.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
